backgammon.settings

Class GameSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • backgammon.settings.GameSettings

  • public class GameSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    GameSettings class Only created this to simplify changing the settings of the game Puts all settings for the actual game in one place..e.g. timeDelay for if it actually needs to be seen
    Author:
    David Lomas - 11035527
